message.body: Lindsey! I'm so sorry I didn't text you back the other day! I totally meant to! My family is here next Saturday, but it's only gonna be my mom, mary and
abby. Emily and jack are staying home because Emily is too stressed to travel this far with jack because he's not very good in the car.
How are your classes? Stressful?
Nice you got to have a beach day :)
Aw no Jack!!! It's good, just a ton of work and feels like baby sitting a little.
I know! Kind of a bummer, but I'm also a little relieved...it'll be more manageable with just 3 people instead of 5
What you been up to today?
I know what you mean! Probably easier in some ways. I had to take Alison to the airport at 4:30 this morning and now i have her at for a week.
Just worked in the studio and set up my new animation stand!
What about you?
Oooh nice! Sounds good! Jules and I picked up his grandma and howard and we drove to new jersey to meet his cousins new baby...we just got back like 30 mins ago
Felt like a long day
Awww that sounds so nice. You need a drinky poo
I do need a drink!
What's your schedule like this week?
Workin' and a studio thing on Tuesday night. Friday night I'm gonna try to see Boyhood
Cool! I hear that's good! I think it might be playing at one of the free outdoor movies this summer...
Let's try and hang soon! :)
I'm excited to see it! Week days are hard til august. I get home and just want to eat and go to bed. But weekends are party time!
I totally understand! Any interest in a late afternoon brunch date tomorrow??
Yeah!! Totally. Will be nice before the week starts!
Cool! Where's a good place to go?
Sabrinas?
Sabrina's is the best! Or honeys!
I like both! I just thought of sabrinas because it's close
Yeah it has a lot of seating too. Text me when you wanna go. I'll be home prepping for class!
Cool! I was thinking noonish :)
I'll text you!
Perfect. Have a good evening!
You too! #dogs
#dannonfruitcup #loveofmylife
Come over in 30?
Sure!! See you then!
Oops...meant to write 12:30...Come over at 12:30??
I'll probably be 12:40.
Ok cool
I'm at yr house
Haha ok!!
